articles.title: DPRK Workers Meet to Pledge New Year Tasks Fulfillment
articles.content:
DPRK Workers Meet to Pledge New Year Tasks Fulfillment
 Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- Sunday witnessed meetings of workers, trade union members, agricultural workers and members of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea to vow the implementation of the tasks in the New Year Address of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in the plaza in front of the Monument to Party Founding and at the Chongsan Co-op Farm in Kangso District, Nampho City.
					 Reports were made and vowing speeches also delivered at the meetings.
					
					 The reporters and speakers said that the New Year Address serves as a guideline which all the more inspired the people with the confidence in final victory in the accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche and with optimism and which illuminates the way ahead.
					
					 They also noted that it serves as a militant banner of encouraging all the service personnel and people to speed up the grand Mallima advance.
					
					 They called for upholding this year's slogan "Let us launch a revolutionary general offensive to achieve fresh victory on all fronts of building a powerful socialist country!" to frustrate the challenges of the hostile forces making last-ditch efforts and raise the overall power of the Republic to a new stage of development.
					
					 They also appealed to the people to make more vigorous efforts to bring earlier the final victory of Juche revolution under the great plans in the New Year Address.
					
					 The outline for the socialist emulation for the creation of Mallima speed 2018 was made public at the meetings.

articles.title: People of Various Localities Vow to Fulfill This Year Tasks
articles.content:
People of Various Localities Vow to Fulfill This Year Tasks
 Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- Residents of several localities met on Jan. 6 and 7 to pledge the implementation of the tasks in the New Year Address of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					 Those were South and North Phyongan Province and South and North Hwanghae Province and Jagang Province and Nampho City.
					
					 Attending those events were officials, workers, youth and students at Party and power organs, working people's bodies, factories, enterprises, co-op farms, universities, etc.
					
					 Reports and vowing speeches were made at the meetings.
					
					 The reporters and speakers said the New Year Address serves as a militant banner of inspiring all the more all the service personnel and people with the confidence in sure victory in the accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche and with optimism and of encouraging them to speed up the building of a powerful socialist country.
					
					 They also appealed to all the officials and Party members and other working people to launch a revolutionary general offensive dynamically to achieve fresh victory on all fronts of building of a powerful socialist country by taking the historic victory in the building of the DPRK's nuclear forces as a springboard for fresh progress.
					
					 They called for making vigorous efforts to bring earlier the final victory in Juche revolution under the great plans in the New Year Address, firmly united behind the Party.
					
					 At the end of the meetings there took place demonstrations.
					
					 The demonstrators marched through the plazas and streets, chanting revolutionary and militant slogans.

articles.title: Inter-Korean Relations to Be Improved by Our Nation Itself
articles.content:
Inter-Korean Relations to Be Improved by Our Nation Itself
 Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- The New Year Juche 107 (2018) is a significant year both for the north and the south of Korea.
					 To improve the inter-Korean relations by concerted efforts of the north and the south is an important issue not only for celebrating the great national events in a splendid manner but also demonstrating the dignity and spirit of the nation at home and abroad.
					
					 It has been 70 years since a homogenous nation with the same blood and language was divided by the outsiders.
					
					 The consciousness of national independence makes a nation strong and a country prosperous, but the flunkeyism and idea of dependence on outside forces are the venom which makes the nation slavish and spiritless.
					
					 Through the distress-torn history, the Korean nation have already experienced that the submission to and dependence on outside forces precisely mean the national ruin.
					
					 The master of improved inter-Korean relations is not the outsiders but the Korean nation itself. And it is none other than the Korean nation which will grow wealthy and powerful, if the north and the south achieved the reconciliation and unity.
					
					 It is so clear that everything will go well to meet the aspiration and will of the whole Korean nation when the north and the south hold sincere discussions over the improvement of inter-Korean relations and seek a way out for its settlement in a bold manner on the basis of the concerted efforts of the nation without being obsessed by bygone days.

articles.title: Establishing Climate Favorable for National Reconciliation and Reunification Is Essential for Improving Inter-Korean Relations
articles.content:
Establishing Climate Favorable for National Reconciliation and Reunification Is Essential for Improving Inter-Korean Relations
 Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address called on the north and the south to improve the relations between themselves and take decisive measures for achieving a breakthrough for independent reunification without being obsessed by bygone days.
					 The improvement of Inter-Korean relations is a most important task to be carried out by the concerted efforts of the entire nation.
					
					 Therefore, the establishment of a climate favorable for national reconciliation and reunification is the fundamental prerequisite to improving the frozen inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The willingness to improve inter-Korean relations should be proved by practical actions for independent reunification which promote national reconciliation and unity, not merely by words.
					
					 It is nothing but an act opposing the improvement of inter-Korean relations and deceptive policy misleading the internal and external opinions to block contact and travel by people of different social strata and suppress the atmosphere for reunification through alliance with the north under absurd pretexts and by invoking legal and institutional mechanisms while only paying lip-service to improved inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The history of inter-Korean relations proved that the improvement of north-south relations could never be achieved only by the efforts of one side, but the concerted efforts of both sides for national cooperation.
					
					 As the inter-Korean relations are, to all intents and purposes, an internal matter of the Korean nation, dependence on the outsiders will make matters more complicated.
					
					 The authorities of the north and the south should play responsible and leading role ahead of others in improving inter-Korean relations and its success or failure depends on how big efforts they would pay to it.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Trump's National Security Strategy
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Trump's National Security Strategy
 Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- At the end of last year U.S. President Trump announced a report on national security strategy.
					 Terming this new security strategy a dangerous one for confrontation and domination that may drive the global peace into an irretrievable phase of destruction, Rodong Sinmun Sunday in an article says:
					
					 The report shows that the U.S. is more viciously trying to block the advance of mankind desirous of progress and peace.
					
					 The swollen-headed Trump group thinks that it can easily deal with any international issue on the strength.
					
					 For the U.S. strength means "justice" and doctrine for existence as it is vociferating about "doctrine of strength being all-powerful".
					
					 Former U.S. President Obama pursued the policy of "strategic patience" to isolate and stifle the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and the present Trump administration adopted a new policy of "maximum pressure and engagement". They are, in fact, a "big-stick policy".
					
					 This is nothing but an extension of the hostile policy toward the DPRK aimed to bring it down by putting maximum pressure and strangling it in all aspects of politics, economy and culture on the basis of military muscle.
					
					 Public opinions brand Trump's new national security strategy as unbalanced, prejudiced and foolish strategy consistent with Cold War-mode of thinking, viewpoint and futile attempt.
					
					 History will mete out punishment of destruction to the U.S., empire of evils which has pursued the "big-stick policy" down through centuries.

articles.title: Release of Prisoners of Conscience Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Release of Prisoners of Conscience Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- The Family Movement for Realizing Democracy in south Korea reportedly held the 1152nd Thursday rally in Seoul on January 4 to demand the release of prisoners of conscience and repeal of the "Security Law".
					 Recalling that unjust regime was toppled and a new regime emerged last year, speakers there deplored that there are still prisoners of conscience.
					
					 Urging the court to acknowledge that the "Security Law" is problematic, they called on the public to struggle to get it repealed.
					
					 They expressed their will to carry on their struggle for the release of prisoners of conscience and the repeal of SL.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Reported in Guinea
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Reported in Guinea
Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- The Guinean National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on Jan. 2 carried on its bulletin the full text of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's New Year Address.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Regional Bodies
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Regional Bodies
 Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- Regional bodies issued statements on Jan. 1 and 2 in support of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's New Year Address.
					 The Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Organization said that Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address called on the Korean people to wage a dynamic struggle for putting the overall national strength of the DPRK on a new higher stage this year marking its 70th birthday.
					
					 He declared that the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government would develop good-neighborly and friendly relations with all countries which respect the sovereignty of the DPRK and are friendly toward it and strive to build a just and peaceful new world, it added.
					
					 The Arab Regional Committee for Friendship and Solidarity with the Korean People noted that Kim Jong Un clarified the DPRK's will to defend peace. And it appealed to the international community to extend support to the Korean people's struggle for peace and security on the Korean peninsula, clearly distinguishing who wants peace or who wants war.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Line of Independent Reunification Supported Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Line of Independent Reunification Supported Abroad
 Pyongyang, January 7 (KCNA) -- The African Regional Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a statement on Jan. 3 in support of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's New Year Address.
					 The statement said:
					
					 With deep interest we heard the New Year Address of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un carrying the profound policies.
					
					 In the New Year Address, he clarified the tasks for achieving fresh victory in the building of a powerful socialist country with the historic victory won in the building of state nuclear force as a springboard for fresh progress.
					
					 He expressed the bold decision to have in-depth discussion on the north-south relations and open the way for their improvement by the Koreans themselves without foreign interference.
					
					 We demand that the south Korean authorities no longer turn down the nation's desire for improved north-south relations and join in the outsiders' moves fostering the national division.
					
					 We are confident that the entire Korean nation will thwart the moves of the separatist forces and realize the independent reunification of the country by its united efforts and thus contribute to ensuring the regional and global peace.
					
					 Kim Jong Un in the New Year Address solemnly declared that the DPRK, as a peace-loving responsible nuclear power, would neither have recourse to nuclear weapons unless the hostile forces of aggression violate its sovereignty and interests nor threaten any other country or region by means of nuclear weapons.
					
					 We fully support his line of independent reunification and foreign policy stand.

articles.title: Tienen lugar mitines de juramento de entidades de masas
articles.content:
Tienen lugar mitines de juramento de entidades de masas 
Pyongyang, 7 de enero (ACNC) -- Se efectuaron el dia 7 en la explanada frente al Monumento a la Fundacion del Partido y la Granja Cooperativa de Chongsan del municipio de Kangso de la ciudad de Nampho los mitines de juramento de los obreros y gremiales de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea y de los trabajadores agricolas y miembros de la Union de Trabajadores Agricolas de Corea para cumplir las tareas presentadas en el Mensaje del Ano Nuevo del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.
					En las ocasiones hubo informes e intervenciones.
					
					Los oradores senalaron que el Mensaje del Ano Nuevo deviene la guia programatica que multiplica la seguridad y el optimismo de la victoria final de la causa revolucionaria del Juche e ilumina la ruta de avance.
					
					Igualmente, -prosiguieron- es la bandera combativa que llama a todos los militares y civiles coreanos a la gran marcha de Mallima.
					
					Exhortaron a tomar parte activa en la campana de este ano destinada a frustrar los retos de las desesperadas fuerzas hostiles y llevar todo el poderio nacional a la nueva fase de desarrollo bajo la consigna:"!Alcancemos nuevos triunfos en todos los dominios de la construccion de la potencia socialista con una ofensiva general revolucionaria!"
					
					Llamaron a luchar con mas vigor por adelantar la victoria final de la revolucion del Juche segun el maravilloso proyecto presentado por el Maximo Dirigente en su Mensaje del Ano Nuevo.
					
					Al final de los actos, se publicaron los programas de emulacion socialista de 2018 para crear la velocidad de Mallima.

articles.title: Tienen lugar mitines provinciales en acato al Mensaje del Ano Nuevo de Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Tienen lugar mitines provinciales en acato al Mensaje del Ano Nuevo de Kim Jong Un
Pyongyang, 7 de enero (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar los dias 6 y 7 en las provincias de Phyong-an del Sur y Phyong-an del Norte, Hwanghae del Sur y Hwanghae del Norte y Jagang y en la ciudad de Nampho los mitines multitudinarios para cumplir las tareas presentadas en el Mensaje del Ano Nuevo del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.
					Asistieron a las ocasiones los funcionarios de los organismos locales del Partido y el Poder, entidades de masas, fabricas, empresas, granjas, universidades, etc., asi como los trabajadores y jovenes de las respectivas localidades.
					
					En los mitines hubo informes y discursos de juramento. 
					
					Los oradores dijeron que el Mensaje del Ano Nuevo del Maximo Dirigente es la bandera combativa que aumenta la seguridad y el optimismo de la victoria de la causa revolucionaria del Juche y llama a todos los militares y civiles coreanos a la construccion de una potencia socialista. 
					
					Insistieron en que todos los funcionarios, militantes del Partido y trabajadores deben tomar la victoria historica alcanzada en la preparacion de las fuerzas armadas nucleares de la Republica como un trampolin para el nuevo desarrollo y desarrollar con dinamismo una ofensiva general revolucionaria para lograr nuevas victorias en todos los dominios de la construccion de un poderoso Estado socialista.
					
					Llamaron a todos a luchar energicamente, unidos mas compactamente en torno al Partido del Trabajo de Corea, por adelantar la victoria final de la revolucion del Juche segun el maravilloso proyecto presentado en el mensaje del Ano Nuevo.
					
					Acto seguido, hubo marchas masivas.
					
					Los manifestantes se desfilaron por las plazas y calles gritando las consignas revolucionarias y combativas.
